item.title: OpenTelemetry Basics
item.description: OpenTelemetry Basics I got to work on integrating OpenTelemetry in the application that our team maintains recently so I’m starting a series documenting my learnings throughout this journey. A little background info on the application I’m working on: it’s a Slack chatbot written in Typescript using BoltJS. Our goal is to know how many users are using our Slack bot with a breakdown of the percentage of successful and error interactions.
